name: Bug's feed
description: Bug's feed is a local hosted portal where you can search for the latest news, videos, CVEs, vulnerabilities... It's implemented as a PWA application so you can get rid of the explorer and use it as a desktop application. Navigate through different tabs and take a look to the latest bugs or search in all of them at once. It comes with a configuration pane in which you can modify hashtags and video channels to your own belong.
